name: Claude + Playwright (Fixed)
updateContentCommand: echo 'Starting Install...' > install.log && npm install -g @anthropic-ai/claude-code >> install.log 2>&1 && (ls package.json || npm init -y) >> install.log 2>&1 && npm pkg set type='module' >> install.log 2>&1 && npm install -D @playwright/test typescript @types/node >> install.log 2>&1 && echo '{"compilerOptions":{"target":"ES2022","module":"NodeNext","moduleResolution":"NodeNext","types":["node"]}}' > tsconfig.json && echo 'Done!' >> install.log
